title: Minecraft - Pocket Edition v0.7.1.Full
description:
Minecraft is about placing blocks to build things and going on adventures!

Pocket Edition includes randomly generated worlds, multiplayer over a local Wi-Fi 

network, and Survival and Creative modes. You can craft and create with your friends 

anywhere in the world so long as you have hands spare and battery to burn.


Our most recent update added the iconic Creepers. They big, green, mean and

were continuing to add loads of new features, including...

- Food! Now you can cook and go hungry

- Swords! Bows! TNT!

- Chests

- Skeletons

- Spiders

- Beds

- Paintings

- Lots more!

But enough talk! Download it already! And have fun!
